content: what's the status of this EIP now?  not going into berlin?

author: timbeiko
content: Not going into Berlin. Latest update here: https://hackmd.io/@timbeiko/1559-updates

author: sky.cactus
content:
Proposal: Only accept transactions with a fee_cap >= 75% of current block's base fee.
Proposal: Evict transactions with a fee_cap <= 50% of current block's base fee.
Does this create any weird DoS attack vectors?

author: sky.cactus
content: I don't *think* it does, unless the base fee is seeing a huge amount of volatility.

author: timbeiko
content: <@!301186049323958275> the base fee isn't part of the txn, no?

author: timbeiko
content: Do you mean "a fee cap >75% of the current base fee"?
